description:
Heybot and Nejiru decide to fire up their Heybotournament game for the first time in a while. But the game`s antagonist, the genius inventor Dr. Nejily, seems to have some kind of grudge against the two! He uses the power of the Shady-Shady Screw to project himself into the real world and encourages all comers to his laboratory to try to get it from him! Can our heroes surmount the dungeon`s dangers and find the powerful new screw?!
Source: crunchyroll
